name: Spruce Town
description:
Made by Xavier Ashley(me)

Art made by Macie (https://www.instagram.com/los3r.m4cie/)

Music by Winter Lawrence

W and D to move, E to interact

I don't  know how linux files work so I'm sorry if the linux version doesn't work

Lights, Camera, Action!

Enter the town of Spruce Town and uncover a couple of the mysteries that take place there.

Speak to the villagers that reside there to uncover them.

Made for the Brackeys game jam 2022

I wish I had more time than I had to make the game, but I had to go to school which severely limited my time to work on it.

I'm new to game development, and I learned a lot making this game.

Please give me any criticism you have because I'm still trying to learn as much as possible
